entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 06:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Wet snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:38 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
